Estimation Methodology

Important: ROM estimates based on user inputs and published unit-rate assumptions; not a bid. Validate with vendor quotes and project-specific takeoffs.

Our Approach

CostFlowAI provides Rough Order of Magnitude (ROM) estimates for preliminary budgeting and planning purposes. Our calculations use:

  • Industry-standard formulas: Established calculation methods for volume, area, and material quantities
  • Published unit rates: Publicly available cost data from construction industry sources
  • Regional adjustments: Location-based pricing factors where applicable
  • Waste factors: Standard allowances for material waste and cutting losses (typically 20%)

Limitations

Our estimates are not substitutes for professional takeoffs and should not be used for:

  • Final bid preparation
  • Material procurement
  • Contract negotiations
  • Project financing decisions

Professional Validation Required

All estimates must be verified by qualified professionals including:

  • Licensed general contractors
  • Professional estimators
  • Structural engineers (where applicable)
  • Local material suppliers

Accuracy Disclaimer

Actual costs may vary significantly due to:

  • Local market conditions
  • Project complexity
  • Site conditions
  • Material specifications
  • Labor availability
  • Economic factors
